fact_list.fact_text: Signals given by Police Officers directing traffic take precedence over road signs, traffic light signals, road markings, and traffic regulations.
Vehicles approaching Police Officer from all directions must stop.
Vehicles approaching Police Officer from the front and behind must stop.
Vehicles approaching Police Officer from his/her right and left may proceed.
Vehicles approaching Police Officer from his/her right, front, and behind must stop.
Vehicles approaching Police Officer from his/her left may proceed.
